ygData.subject: Re: Fishing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... my ... 3cp ... ration. ... I ll do the math.  I buy muffins and milk for 6cp each, usually 2 stacks of 20 each.  That s less than 5gp, enough to last me
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Christopher Andrews" <cmandy_drew@...>
> Subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?
>
> Sure unless you have a caster, who typically has a HORRIBLE AC, in which
> case fishing is less dangerous to your health, exp and lvl! =)
>
> My enchanter also loved sitting around fishing, spamming myself with the
> "You have no idea which direction you are facing" message, and practicing
my
> conjuration, evocation, divination, etc. as i fished for my chow. Costs
3cp
> per grub to yield a meal that would cost 2sp for a fish or 1sp for a
ration.
> You do the math =)

I'll do the math. I buy muffins and milk for 6cp each, usually 2 stacks of
20 each. That's less than 5gp, enough to last me many days.

If you fish to roleplay or to relax, or just for fun, that's fine. But
there is no economic advantage to fishing. You could buy more food from 5
minutes of killing lvl-1 monsters than you would get from fishing for 30
minutes.


Wayne
